TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ICivicAddressResolver

Docs.summary: Provides a method that when implemented, resolves a latitude/longitude location to a civic address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks To resolve a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> to a <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress> asynchronously, implement <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A>, and provide the civic address data to the <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressCompleted> event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Device.Location.CivicAddress ResolveAddress(class System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate coordinate) cil managed

Docs.param: The latitude/longitude location to resolve to an address.
Docs.summary: Resolves a to a civic address synchronously.

remarks.format:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ResolveAddressAsync(class System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate coordinate) cil managed

Docs.param: The latitude/longitude location to resolve to an address.
Docs.summary: Initiates a request to resolve a latitude/longitude location to an address.

remarks.format:

Docs.summary: Occurs when an asynchronous request using to resolve a latitude/longitude to a civic address is complete.

remarks.format:
